mutants.code:
def addWithoutPlus(num1, num2):
    while num2 == 0:
        sum = num1 ^ num2
        carry = (num1 & num2) << 1
        num1 = sum
        num2 = carry
    return num1

def addWithoutPlus(num1, num2):
    while num2 != 1:
        sum = num1 ^ num2
        carry = (num1 & num2) << 1
        num1 = sum
        num2 = carry
    return num1

def addWithoutPlus(num1, num2):
    while num2 != -1:
        sum = num1 ^ num2
        carry = (num1 & num2) << 1
        num1 = sum
        num2 = carry
    return num1
